source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video is a dramatic, wide-angle scenery shot of a cityscape under an immense storm system. The primary motion is the rapid, churning movement of massive storm clouds gathering and swirling over the buildings. The time-lapse effect emphasizes the powerful and turbulent nature of the weather as it moves across the sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: It is not a wide angle;an extreme wide shot is a more appropriate description.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The description should specify that it is an extreme wide shot rather than just a wide-angle shot, as this more accurately captures the vastness of the scene.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The description should specify that it is an extreme wide shot rather than just a wide-angle shot, as this more accurately captures the vastness of the scene.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This video is a dramatic, extreme wide shot of a cityscape under an immense storm system. The primary motion is the rapid, churning movement of massive storm clouds gathering and swirling over the buildings. The time-lapse effect emphasizes the powerful and turbulent nature of the weather as it moves across the sky.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video is a dramatic, extreme wide shot of a cityscape under an immense storm system. The primary motion is the rapid, churning movement of massive storm clouds gathering and swirling over the buildings. The time-lapse effect emphasizes the powerful and turbulent nature of the weather as it moves across the sky.

generated_critique: The caption correctly identifies the main subject as a storm system over a cityscape and notes the time-lapse effect. However, it relies on subjective adjectives like "dramatic," "immense," "powerful," and "turbulent," which should be avoided in favor of objective descriptions of motion. The final sentence, which explains what the time-lapse "emphasizes," is an abstract interpretation rather than a direct description of the visual events. A more effective caption would describe the motion with greater specificity and chronological order. For example, the video likely shows the clouds moving in a clear direction, such as rolling in from the horizon to eventually cover the entire sky. A better description might be: "In a time-lapse view, a dense mass of dark clouds moves from left to right across the frame, swirling and expanding as it passes over the cityscape, causing the light on the buildings to progressively dim." This provides a more concrete and sequential account of the motion.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: In a time-lapse view, a dense mass of dark clouds moves from left to right across the frame, swirling and expanding as it passes over the cityscape, causing the light on the buildings to progressively dim.
